{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07873v1", "title": "Spectral Periodic Differential Operators of Odd Order", "summary": "In this paper, we establish a condition on the coefficients of the
differential operators L generated by an ordinary differential expression of
odd order with periodic, complex-valued coefficients, under which the operator
L is a spectral operator.", "main_category": "math.SP", "categories": "math.SP", "published": "2025-04-10T15:46:53Z"}
